class.name: PIXI.Polygon

parameters.name: points*
parameters.help: This can be an array of Points that form the polygon,

class.help:
a flat array of numbers that will be interpreted as [x,y, x,y, ...], or the arguments passed can be
all the points of the polygon e.g. `new PIXI.Polygon(new PIXI.Point(), new PIXI.Point(), ...)`, or the
arguments passed can be flat x,y values e.g. `new PIXI.Polygon(x,y, x,y, x,y, ...)` where `x` and `y` are
Numbers.

public.name: clone
public.help: Creates a clone of this polygon

public.name: contains

returns.help: Whether the x/y coordinates are within this polygon

public.help: Checks whether the x and y coordinates passed to this function are contained within this polygon

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The X coordinate of the point to test

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The Y coordinate of the point to test
